#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long t,a[90],ne=0,f=0,sc=1;;
	string s=" ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ",s1;
	cin>>t;
	for(long long i=1;i<=88;i++)
		{
				if(i<=1)
				ne=i;
				else{
				ne=f+sc;
				f=sc;
				sc=ne;}
		
					if(ne>26)	
						{
							if(ne%26==0) a[i]=26;
							else
							a[i]=ne%26;
						}
					else	
					a[i]=ne;
					//cout<<a[i]<<"\t";
					
		}
	while(t>0)
	{
		s1="";
		long long n;
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			s1+=s[a[i]];
			}
		cout<<s1<<endl;	
		t--;
	}
}
